title: Popcorn
comment: This is a simple and classic snack that is perfect for movie nights or anytime you're craving something salty and crunchy.
recipe:
1. Heat the kernels in a pot until they pop.
2. Melt butter in a separate pan.
3. Drizzle the melted butter over the popcorn and sprinkle with salt.

title: Nachos
comment: These loaded nachos are a crowd-pleaser and can be customized with your favorite toppings like jalapeños, guacamole, or extra cheese.
recipe:
1. Spread tortilla chips on a baking sheet.
2. Sprinkle cheese on top and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 5   until cheese melts.
3. Serve with sour cream, salsa, and jalapeños.

title: Pizza Rolls
comment: These pizza rolls are a fun twist on traditional pizza and are perfect for a quick and easy snack or appetizer.
recipe:
1. Roll out pizza dough and cut into small rectangles.
2. Add a spoonful of tomato sauce, cheese, and pepperoni.
3. Roll up the dough and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10    .

title: Fruit Skewers
comment: These fruit skewers are a healthy and colorful snack that is perfect for parties or as a light dessert.
recipe:
1. Cut fruits into bite-sized pieces.
2. Thread the fruits onto skewers.
3. Serve chilled for a refreshing snack.

title: Chocolate Fondue
comment: This chocolate fondue is a decadent treat that is perfect for dipping fruits or marshmallows for a sweet and indulgent snack.
ingredients: Assorted fruits for dipping (strawberries, bananas, apple slices)
recipe:
1. Melt chocolate and cream in a double boiler.
2. Stir until smooth.
3. Serve with fruit pieces for dipping.

title: Cheese Platter
comment: This cheese platter is a sophisticated and elegant snack that is perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying a quiet night in.
recipe:
1. Arrange the cheeses on a platter.
2. Add crackers and fruits for pairing.
3. Serve immediately for a savory snack.

comment: This classic combination of chips and guacamole is a simple and satisfying snack that is perfect for sharing with friends or enjoying on your own.
title: Chips and Guacamole
recipe:
1. Mash avocados and mix with red onion, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Serve with tortilla chips for dipping.

title: Mini Sandwiches
comment: These mini sandwiches are a quick and easy snack that is perfect for lunchboxes or picnics.
recipe:
1. Cut bread rolls in half.
2. Layer with ham, cheese, and lettuce.
3. Serve immediately.

title: Popcorn Chicken
comment: These crispy popcorn chicken bites are a delicious and satisfying snack that is perfect for parties or as a quick and easy meal.
ingredients: 500g chicken breast, cut into small pieces
recipe:
1. Coat chicken pieces in breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan.
2. Fry or bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10-15     until golden and crispy.

title: Veggie Sticks with Hummus
comment: These veggie sticks with hummus are a healthy and satisfying snack that is perfect for a quick pick-me-up or as a light appetizer.
recipe:
1. Slice vegetables into sticks.
2. Serve with a side of hummus for dipping.
